mapper.insert:
insert into cy_customer ( id_customer, customer_name, party_no, customer_sex, card_id, phone_no, provinces, city, regional, email, date_birth, customer_age, residential_address, residential_tel, company_address, company_tel, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) values
( (select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id), #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.partyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.provinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.regional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.customerAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.residentialAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.residentialTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'system',now(),'system',now() )

insert into cy_case ( id_case, case_serial_number, collection_status, fixed_quota, overdue_amount, overdue_days, late_stage, collection_phase, remaining_principal, overdue_interest, late_charge, cancel_date, statement_date, due_date, latest_payment_date, latest_payment_amount, card_start_date, card_stop_date, collection_date, concordance_x_day, concordance_30_day, concordance_60_day, case_identify_1, case_identify_2,case_identify_3,remark, emp_no, party_no, batch_code, product_name, total_owed, overdue_record, whether_installment, penal_sum, funding_party, regulation_code, minimum_payment, appoint_case_amount, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) values
